name: Chopper
description: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 {hit} damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

name: Zeb Orrelios
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 0, you may spend focus tokens for their default effect to modify results. While defending at attack range 0, the attacker may spend focus tokens for their default effect to modify results.

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
description: After you perform an attack, if the defender was destroyed, each friendly ship at range 0-2 may remove 1 red or orange token.

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
description: While you perform an attack, if you are at range 0-1 of the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each {focus} result, gain 1 focus token. For each {evade} result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, choose either one.

name: Novice Technician
description: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a {hit} result, expose 1 damage card.

name: Tristan Wren
description: While a friendy unit at range 0-3 performs a {ranged} attack, you may spend 1{charge}. If you do, the attacker may change 1 {hit} result to a {crit} result.

name: Baze Malbus
description: While you perform a {focus} action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0-1, to a maximum of 2.

name: Chewbacca
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 {charge} to repair 1 faceup damage card.

name: “Fives”
description: After you perform an attack that missed, if the defender's initiative is equal to or greater than your initiative, place 1 evade or focus token on this card. Before you engage, you may remove 1 token from this card to gain 1 matching token.

name: Freelance Slicer
description: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a {hit} or {crit} result, gain 1 jam token.

name: Jango Fett
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend your lock on the enemy ship to change 1 of the enemy ship's {focus} results to a blank result.

name: Sabine Wren
description:
Setup: Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card.
After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

name: Tactical Officer
description: Adds {coordinate}

name: Hera Syndulla
description: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you have 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1 {hit} damage.

name: Informant
description: Setup: After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the Listening Device condition to it.

name: Jyn Erso
description: If a friendly ship at range 0-3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

name: Super Commandos
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to drop a Commando Team remote using the [1{s}] template. You can place that device using its front or rear guides. This card's {charge} cannot be recovered.

name: Toryn Farr
description: After you coordinate a friendly ship, it may acquire a lock on a ship you are locking, ignoring range restrictions.

name: Wolfpack
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if the attacker is in your firing arc, the defender may gain 1 strain token to acquire a lock on the attacker.

name: Commander Pyre
description: Setup: After placing forces, choose an enemy ship in play or on the mission deployment chart. It gains 2 stress tokens. While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may reroll 1 defense die.

name: Ghost Company
description:
Adds {rotate}{to}!{focus}
After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a {at} attack against a ship you have not attacked this round as a bonus attack.

name: GNK "Gonk" Droid
description:
Setup: Lose 1 {charge}.
Action: Recover 1 {charge}.
Action: Spend 1 {charge} to recover 1 shield.

name: Magva Yarro
description: After you defend, if the attack hit, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

name: Nien Nunb
description: Decrease the diffculty of your bank maneuvers ({bl} and {br}).

name: Fenn Rau
description: Before a friendly ship at range 0-2 engages, if its revealed maneuver is 1 speed or higher and there is an enemy ship in its {af} at range 1, that friendly ship may remove 1 non-lock red token.

name: K-2SO
description:
Adds: {calculate}{jam}
During the System Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship gains 1 calculate token and 1 stress token.

name: Agent Terex
description: Setup: Equip this side faceup and place 3 calculate tokens on this card. At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3 and choose to remove 1 calculate token from this card to have that ship gain a matching token. Then, if there are no calculate tokens on this card, flip it.
flippedDescription:
During the System Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a {hit} or {crit} result, gain 1 calculate token. Otherwise gain 1 jam token.
Action: Transfer 1 jam token to a ship at range 0-3.

name: C-3PO
description:
Adds {calculate}
Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many {evade} results, add 1 {evade} result. After you perform the {calculate} action, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Ursa Wren
description: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object. After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is locked by an enemy ship, you may perform a {lock} action.

name: Kit Fisto
description:
Adds @{evade}
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-1 and spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, it may perform a red {evade} action.

name: Leia Organa
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3{charge}. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the diffculty of its red maneuvers.

name: Perceptive Copilot
description: After you perform a {focus} action, gain 1 focus token.

name: R2-D2
description: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a {hit} result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

name: Seasoned Navigator
description: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its diffculty.

name: Plo Koon
description:
Adds @{reinforce}
At the start of the End Phase, if you are reinforced, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0 or in your {al} or {ar} at range 1. That ship removes 1 deplete or strain token, or repairs 1 faceup damage card.

name: Saw Gerrera
description: While you perform an attack, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage to change all of your {focus} results to {crit} results.

name: Ahsoka Tano
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to choose 1 friendly ship in your {afr} at range 1-2. If you do, that ship may perform a red {focus} action, even while stressed.

name: Savage Opress
description: After a friendly ship in your {af} at range 1-2 gains a stress of strain token, you may spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token.

name: Aayla Secura
description: While an enemy ship in your {ab} performs an attack, if the defender is friendly and at range 0-2, the defender may change 1 blank result to a {focus} result.

name: ISB Slicer
description: During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1-2 cannot remove jam tokens.

name: Ciena Ree
description: After you perform a {coordinate} action, if the ship you coordinated performed a {barrel} or {boost} action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90°.

name: Grand Moff Tarkin
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 2{charge}. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.

name: Agent Kallus
description: Immediately assign the Hunted condition to 1 enemy ship in play or on the mission deployment chart, then flip this card.
flippedDescription:
While you perform an attack against the ship with the Hunted condition, you may change 1 of your {focus} results to a {hit} result.
After that ship is destroyed, flip this card.

name: Captain Hark
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you are not focused, you may spend 1 {charge} to gain 1 focus token.

name: Minister Tua
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are damaged, you may perform a red !{reinforce} action.

name: Gar Saxon
description: While a friendly ship at range 1-3 with an initiative of 4 or lower performs an attack against a defender you have locked, the attacker may change 1 {focus} result to a {hit} result.

name: Moff Jerjerrod
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 2{charge}. If you do, choose the [1{bl}], [1{s}], or [1{br}] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red !{boost} action using that template.

name: Seventh Sister
description: If an enemy ship at range 0-1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

name: Grand Inquisitor
description: After an enemy ship at range 0-2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

name: Admiral Sloane
description:
After another friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens.
While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Petty Officer Thanisson
description:
Adds {calculate}
During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after an enemy ship in your {af} at range 0-1 gains a red or orange token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship gains 1 additional token of the type that it gained.

name: Cassian Andor
description: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-2 and guess aloud a bearing and speed, then look at that ship's dial. If the chosen ship's bearing and speed match your guess, you may set your dial to another maneuver.

name: Kanan Jarrus
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

name: Korkie Kryze
description:
After a friendly ship in your {aff} at range 1-2 becomes the defender, you may transfer 1 green token to it.
While a friendly ship in your {aff} at range 1-2 defends, if you obstruct the attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

name: C-3PO
description:
Adds {calculate}
While you defend, if you are calculating, you may reroll 1 defense die. After you perform a {calculate} action, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Satine Kryze
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 {charge}. If you do, each friendly ship may choose to gain 1 deplete token and 1 focus tokken or to gain 1 disarm token and 1 evade token.

name: Obi-wan Kenobi
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 spends a focus or evade token, you may spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token.

name: Han Solo
description:
Adds !{evade}
After you perform an {evade} action, gain additional evade tokens equal to the number of enemy ships at range 0-1.

name: Chewbacca
description: Setup: Lose 1 {charge}. After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is dealt 1 damage card, recover 1 {charge}. While you perform an attack, you may spend 2 {charge} to change 1 {focus} result to a {crit} result.

name: Larma D'Acy
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform {reinforce}, {coordinate}, and {jam} actions, even while stressed. While you perform a white {reinforce}, {coordinate}, or {jam} action, if you are stressed, treat that action as red.

name: GA-97
description: After you perform an {evade} action, you may gain 1 focus token.

name: Kaydel Connix
description: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a basic maneuver of the next higher speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

name: PZ-4CO
description: At the end of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-2. If you do, transfer 1 calculate token to that ship. If your revealed maneuver is blue, you may transfer 1 focus token instead.

name: Korr Sella
description: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, remove all of your stress tokens.

name: C-3PO
description:
Adds {calculate} !{coordinate}
While you coordinate, you can choose friendly ships beyond range 2 if they have {calculate} on their action bar. After you perform the {calculate} or {coordinate} action, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Amilyn Holdo
description: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range 1-2. You may transfer to that ship 1 token of a type that ship does not have. That ship may transfer 1 token to you of a type you do not have.

name: Rose Tico
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 of your results to acquire a lock on the enemy ship.

name: Cikatro Vizago
description: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 {illicit} upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0-1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades.

name: Tobias Beckett
description: Setup: After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

name: 4-LOM
description: While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

name: Boba Fett
description:
Setup: Start in reserve.
At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of any enemy ship.

name: Qi'ra
description: While you move and perform attacks, you ignore obstacles that you are locking.

name: The Mandalorian
description:
Adds {reinforce}
During the End Phase, if you did not defend this round, recover 1 non-recurring {forcecharge}, if able.

name: Unkar Plutt
description: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage to perform 1 white action

name: Zuckuss
description: While you perform an attack, if you are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

name: Cad Bane
description: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform a red {boost} action.

name: Chewbacca
description: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to repair 1 of your faceup damage cards.

name: Peli Motto
description: During the System Phase, you may perform an action on 1 of your damage cards, even while stressed. After you repair a faceup Ship damage card, you may roll 1 attack die. On a {hit} result, repair another faceup Ship damage card. On a {crit} result, expose 1 damage card.

name: Kuiil
description: Action: Roll 1 attack die for each damage card you have. For each {hit} result, repair 1 faceup Ship damage card, then for each {crit} result, repair 1 facedown damage card. For each blank result, remove 1 orange token, then for each {focus} result, gain 1 focus token.

name: L3-37
description: Setup: Equip this side faceup. While you defend, you may flip this card. If you do, the attacker must reroll all attack dice.
flippedDescription: If you are not shielded,decrease the diffculty of your bank ({bl} and {br}) maneuvers.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: After you roll dice, you may spend 1 green token to reroll up to 2 of your results.

name: Latts Razzi
description: While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/{focus} results to an {evade} result.

name: Greef Karga
description:
Adds !{coordinate}
You can coordinate allied ships as if they were friendly ships. After you coordinate a ship, it may acquire a lock on an object you have locked.

name: Gamut Key
description: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 2 {charge} to choose a ship at range 0-1 with 1 or more circular tokens. During the End Phase, circular tokens are not removed from that ship.

name: Rook Kast
description:
Adds !{lock}
After you perform a red action, you may gain 1 strain token. While you perform an attack, if you are strained, you may change 1 of your blank or {focus} results to a result.

name: General Grievous
description: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if there are 2 or more {hit}/{crit} results, you may spend 1 {charge} to cancel 1 {hit} or {crit} result. After a friendly ship is destroyed, recover 1 {charge}.

name: Count Dooku
description: During an attack, before a ship at range 0-2 rolls attack or defense dice, if all of your {forcecharge} are active, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} and name a result. If the roll does not contain the named result, the ship must change 1 die to that result.
